board1.line 1: Narration:-> The clock failed to rang as it died out of batteries...
board1.line 2: Jenna:-> It's 8 o'clock already? Didn't my clock rang at 8?
board1.line 3: Jenna:-> Oh, I hope the world is doing okay....

JennaRoom_Bed.line 1: Jenna:-> I don't feel like sleeping right now.

JennaRoom_Poster.line 1: Jenna:-> I remember I printed out this poster at the campus and set it up here.
JennaRoom_Poster.line 2: Jenna:-> I wonder how long will the pandemic ever going to end...

JennaRoom_Desktop_1.line 1: Jenna:-> Hmmm, I wonder how are my friends doing in social media right now? I should take a look.
JennaRoom_Desktop_1.line 2: Jenna:-> A post on the newsfeed says: A vaccine of the virus will be completed tomorrow.
JennaRoom_Desktop_1.line 3: Jenna:-> I don't think the official news had ever claim a vaccine to be completed tomorrow. They're just spreading misinformation.

JennaRoom_Desktop_2.line 1: Jenna:-> There's a video on other posts on social media let me watch it.
JennaRoom_Desktop_2.line 2: Jenna:-> *Watches a video of an infected boy suffering from pneumonia.*
JennaRoom_Desktop_2.line 3: Jenna:-> I feel so sorry for him, will he ever going to make it?

JennaRoom_Desktop_mobile.line 1: Jenna:-> I look up to my mobile phone, a message notification showed up. It's a message from my mother, she said the following text...
JennaRoom_Desktop_mobile.line 2: Jenna:-> Good Morning Jen, me and your dad are at the hospital. Don't worry we'll be fine you just stay in the house for a while and be a good girl until we get back. Love from MOM
JennaRoom_Desktop_mobile.line 3: Jenna:-> They're gone at the hospital. I hope they're fine...

JennaRoom_Journal.line 1: Jenna:-> Day 133, it's been months for me to stay at home. How long will this ever going to end? I keep bragging about this I really wish things would go back to normal I'm really scared right now.
JennaRoom_Journal.line 2: Jenna:-> Day 135 Will there be a better day for me? I'm so stupid to keep staying at home for such a long time. My parents didn't tell me to go outside, they don't seem to care. They didn't put be grounded, I just don't want to go outside!
JennaRoom_Journal.line 3: Jenna:-> Day 136 I remember one day my dad was at the kitchen, he left a secret code paper on the kitchen counter for the electrical pad key lock behind the lounge at the living room.
JennaRoom_Journal.line 4: Jenna:-> Unfortunately, the paper was half torn but I did remember what the missing part was I think it's 3..7..1... I forgot the last digit it could be either 5 or 6.

JennaRoom_SidePoster.line 1: Jenna:-> Always wash your hand folks or you don't want to get into your funerals early.
JennaRoom_SidePoster.line 2: Jenna:-> That's also right. Staying at home is the world's one way motto to survive.

JennaRoom_Cabinet.line 1: Jenna:-> It's a Cabinet. I laundry my clothes with washing machine at the bathroom 3 days ago and iron them when they were all dry before putting them here a day later.
JennaRoom_Cabinet.line 2: Jenna:-> Hmm.... I'm missing one jean in my cabinet. I wonder where did the other jean go? I hope I didn't lost it.

JennaRoom_Cabinet_foundedJean.line 1: Jenna:-> My clothes are complete, nothing's missing anymore.

JennaRoom_Door.line 1: Jenna:-> I'm so lazy to go out of my room right now. I like to stay here for a little while.

JennaRoom_Door1.line 1: Jenna:-> I think I'm ready to get of my room now.

HouseCorridor_Outside_Door.line 1: Jenna:-> I'm not yet ready to go outside yet. I should go to my parent's room to see what they're doing.

HouseCorridor_Outside_Door_second_plot.line 1: Jenna:-> Is the door locked? They locked me in. I should find a key to open the door somehow.

ParentRoom_Clock.line 1: Jenna:-> There's a clock. It's such in good shape even if it was been bought last year.

ParentRoom_FrontMirror.line 1: Jenna:-> I can see the front view of the bed on the mirror.
ParentRoom_FrontMirror.line 3: Jenna:-> [shake]Oh no[/shake]..... there's a [color=maroon]blood[/color] on my dad's pillow. I wonder what happen to his pillow?

ParentRoom_LeftWardrobe.line 1: Jenna:-> The wardrobe on the left is my mother's.

ParentRoom_RightWardrobe.line 1: Jenna:-> The wardrobe on the left is my father's.

ParentRoom_DoubleSizedBed.line 1: Jenna:-> A double sized bed used for my parents to sleep.

ParentRoom_Windows.line 1: Jenna:-> The windows I can see outside, the sky looks so boring dirty white today.

Bathroom_Jeans.line 1: Jenna:-> Is that my jean I missed out? Oh thank goodness I found it. I should pick it up back to my cabinet.
Bathroom_Jeans.line 2: Jenna:-> What's this paper doing in my pocket? *Takes the paper out from the pocket of her jeans*

Bathroom_Jeans_paper_pickup.line 1: Jenna:-> What the.... What is this?! Who wrote this for me? I can't believe it, someone must be pranking on me. This must be stupid for anyone to make fun on me this isn't funny.

Ending_Dialog.line 1: Jenna:-> I'm not feeling well today *cough* *cough*...
